Package edu.phema.elm_to_omop.helper

Class CirceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.phema.elm_to_omop.helper.CirceUtil
  • public class CirceUtil
extends Object
    Various utility methods, some of which are necessary because the Circe classes don't have constructors, and it's possible to generate invalid objects using the empty default constructors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int OCCURRENCE_AT_LEAST  
      static int OCCURRENCE_AT_MOST  
      static int OCCURRENCE_EXACTLY
      The following constants are defined in the Circe library in v1.6+.

    • Field Detail

      • OCCURRENCE_EXACTLY

        public static final int OCCURRENCE_EXACTLY
        The following constants are defined in the Circe library in v1.6+. Unfortunately, to be compatible with WebAPI v2.2, we need to use Circe v1.5 and so we will redefine them here.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OCCURRENCE_AT_MOST

        public static final int OCCURRENCE_AT_MOST
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int OCCURRENCE_AT_LEAST
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • addCriteriaGroup

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CriteriaGroup[] addCriteriaGroup​(org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CriteriaGroup[] criteriaGroupArray,
                                                                                org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CriteriaGroup group)
        Extends a primitive array of CriteriaGroups by adding a new CriteriaGroup. This is necessary because Circe uses primitive arrays instead of Java collections.
        Parameters:
        criteriaGroupArray - The primitive CriteriaGroup array to extend
        group - The new CriteriaGroup to add
        Returns:
        The extended CriteriaGroup array

      • addCorelatedCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CorelatedCriteria[] addCorelatedCriteria​(org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CorelatedCriteria[] corelatedCriteriaGroupArray,
                                                                                        org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CorelatedCriteria corelatedCriteria)
        Extends a primitive array of CorelatedCriterias by adding a new CorelatedCriteria. This is necessary because Circe uses primitive arrays instead of Java collections.
        Parameters:
        corelatedCriteriaGroupArray - The primitive CorelatedCriteria array to extend
        corelatedCriteria - The new CorelatedCriteria to add
        Returns:
        The extended CorelatedCriteria array

      • addDemographicCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.DemographicCriteria[] addDemographicCriteria​(org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.DemographicCriteria[] demographicCriteriaGroupArray,
                                                                                            org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.DemographicCriteria demographicCriteria)
        Extends a primitive array of DemographicCriterias by adding a new DemographicCriteria. This is necessary because Circe uses primitive arrays instead of Java collections.
        Parameters:
        demographicCriteriaGroupArray - The primitive DemographicCriteria array to extend
        demographicCriteria - The new DemographicCriteria to add
        Returns:
        The extended DemographicCriteria array

      • defaultPrimaryCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.PrimaryCriteria defaultPrimaryCriteria()
        The translator focuses on creating InclusionRules (CriteraGroups really), and we let the initial population consist of anyone with any visit occurrence
        Returns:
        A PrimaryCriteria representing any visit occurrence

      • defaultCorelatedCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CorelatedCriteria defaultCorelatedCriteria()
        Creates an empty CorelatedCriteria using the default values first specified at: https://github.com/PheMA/elm-to-ohdsi-executer/blob/ad9fe6c280817a486ab0449244a39cf72347354e/src/main/java/edu/phema/elm_to_omop/model/omop/CriteriaListEntry.java#L15-L17
        Returns:
        A new CorelatedCriteria with default start window

      • defaultOccurrence

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.Occurrence defaultOccurrence()
        Generate an empty Occurrence with the default value of "at least 1".
        Returns:
        The default occurrence

      • defaultCohortDefinition

        public static org.ohdsi.webapi.service.CohortDefinitionService.CohortDefinitionDTO defaultCohortDefinition()
        Creates a cohort definition and sets the type to SIMPLE_EXPRESSION.
        Returns:
        The default cohort definition

      • inclusionRuleFromCriteriaGroup

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.InclusionRule inclusionRuleFromCriteriaGroup​(String name,
                                                                                            String description,
                                                                                            org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CriteriaGroup criteriaGroup)
        InclusionRules are just a thin wrapper around CriteriaGroups, which contain the expression logic. This method performs the wrapping.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the InclusionRule
        description - The description of the InclusionRule
        criteriaGroup - The CriteriaGroup (expression) to wrap
        Returns:
        The created InclusionRule

      • corelatedCriteriaFromCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CorelatedCriteria corelatedCriteriaFromCriteria​(org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.Criteria criteria,
                                                                                               org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.Occurrence occurrence,
                                                                                               boolean restrictVisit)
        Returns a CorelatedCriteria from a Circe Criteria instance, Occurrence object, and restrictVisit boolean
        Parameters:
        criteria - The Criteria instance to wrap
        occurrence - The Occurrence object
        restrictVisit - Whether or not to restrict the CorelatedCriteria to same visit as the parent Criteria or cohort entry event
        Returns:
        The created CorelatedCriteria

      • criteriaGroupFromCorelatedCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CriteriaGroup criteriaGroupFromCorelatedCriteria​(org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CorelatedCriteria criteria,
                                                                                                CirceConstants.CriteriaGroupType type,
                                                                                                Integer count)
        Generates a Circe CriteriaGroup from a single CorelatedCriteria and group inclusion properties
        Parameters:
        criteria - The CorelatedCriteria
        type - The inclusion type
        count - The inclusion count
        Returns:
        The created CriteriaGroup

      • criteriaGroupFromCriteria

        public static org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.CriteriaGroup criteriaGroupFromCriteria​(org.ohdsi.circe.cohortdefinition.Criteria criteria,
                                                                                       CirceConstants.CriteriaGroupType type,
                                                                                       Integer count,
                                                                                       boolean restrictVisit)
        Generates a Circe CriteriaGroup from a single Criteria, group inclusion, and restrictVisit properties. Defaults are used for the occurrence and window properties.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The Criteria
        type - The inclusion type
        count - The inclusion count
        Returns:
        The created CriteriaGroup
